resources.string: Bitcoin Cash accounts support and BCH to BTC exchange.
Always show current number of connected peers in the notification area.
IP or hostname of single peer to connect to.
Show options to restrict data usage on mobile networks.

This module is part of _logo_ Mycelium. It allows to find unretrieved Bitcoin <font color="#f08c18">Cash</font> and instantly exchange it to Bitcoin. Full Bitcoin <font color="#f08c18">Cash</font> support is coming soon.
Mycelium wallet is not installed\nIt is required for proper module functioning.
You can always access Bitcoin Cash module from Settings > Modules section by tapping on it.
If you are experienced user, you can fine tune your Bitcoin Cash module bellow, otherwise go straight to Mycelium Wallet.

By choosing random or custom full nodes your are risking to expose all your addresses to companies like Chainalysis and lose your transactions anonymity.\n\nProceed further only if you fully understand the consequences!
